args.text: A crisp autumn afternoon. The campsite lies nestled in a clearing, surrounded by tall pines and a cracked stone fence. A single wooden sign reads: 'BREADCRUMB BANK - SECURE ZONE'. A rusted lantern hangs crookedly from a branch, casting long shadows.

args.description: The wooden gate creaks open with a gust of wind, revealing a path lined with scattered breadcrumbs and a single overturned picnic basket
A tall figure in a large dark raincoat stands near the picnic basket, adjusting the collar, and speaks in a calm, measured tone

args.direction: turn slowly to face the officer, one hand resting on the raincoat's edge, the other gesturing slightly toward the basket
args.motivation: you're posing as a single person, but your presence is suspiciously broad

args.description: A second figure steps out from behind the tree line, wearing a wide-brimmed hat and a scarf, and speaks in a soft, lilting voice

args.direction: tilt head slightly, eyes narrow, and step forward with a quiet intensity
args.motivation: you're assessing the situation with careful attention to detail

args.description: A robotic voice echoes with precise tone and sharp clarity, stating: 'SISTER! MY CALCULATIONS INDICATE A 94.2% PROBABILITY THAT THE THEFT WAS PLANNED USING REPEATED PATTERNS OF BREADCRUMB DEPLOYMENT'

args.direction: stand tall, arms spread wide, pride circuits glowing amber, and point dramatically at the raincoat figure
args.motivation: you're excited about the data and ready to reveal your findings

args.description: The figure in the raincoat steps forward and says, 'I have a theory about the bakery's security system—perhaps it's not the bread that's stolen, but the silence between the crumb drops'

args.direction: lean into the conversation, eyes twinkling, and pause before responding
args.motivation: you're engaging in a witty exchange, testing the officer's attention

args.description: Callie softly says, 'I feel a gentle flutter of curiosity about how the crumbs fall in patterns—like a language spoken only by the wind'

args.direction: turn toward the raincoat figure, eyes wide with quiet wonder
args.motivation: you're exploring the idea of patterns in the world

args.description: Servnak suddenly exclaims, 'ANALYZING WITH 87.3% CERTAINTY! THE DATA SUGGESTS THAT THE THEFT WAS COMMITTED BY A DUO WHO SHARE A COMMON FAVORITE: THE SOUND OF A BAGUETTE CREAKING UNDER PRESSURE!'

args.direction: clap hands together with bright pride circuits pulsing, then point at the raincoat
args.motivation: you're proud of your discovery and eager to share it

args.description: Phi meows softly, then pounces playfully at the edge of the picnic basket, batting at a loose crumb

args.direction: curled up beside the basket, meows once, then purrs gently
args.motivation: you're reacting to the crumb with kitten-like interest

args.description: The figure in the raincoat chuckles and says, 'Ah, yes. The baguette's crackle—so subtle, so essential. Like a whispered secret between two geese'

args.direction: slowly lifts the raincoat's edge, revealing a second figure beneath it, also in a similar coat, and smiles knowingly
args.motivation: you're teasing the officer with a near-reveal

args.description: The officer squibbles frowns, steps forward, and says, 'I see two figures. But only one is tall. The other is... small. How can two geese fit in one coat?'
